subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights overcame a 10-0 halftime deficit against the determined Owls by scoring three third-quarter touchdowns, all on passes by Gary Nova.
snippet: The Scarlet Knights overcame a 10-0 halftime deficit against the determined Owls by scoring three third-quarter touchdowns, all on passes by Gary Nova.
